***Version [0.32](/0.32 "0.32")**: This article is up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup*.*

*This page refers to the type of equipment. For the object of your quest, see [Orb of Zot](/Orb_of_Zot "Orb of Zot"). For the spell, see [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction").*

|   |                                                                                            |

|   | A sphere of crystal, carried in place of a shield. Magic scintillates within its interior. |

**Orbs** are a piece of equipment you can carry in your off-hand. Unlike [shields](/Shields "Shields"), they provide no defensive value, but come with one of several unique egos:

- [Energy](/Energy "Energy") - Provides two sources of passive [channeling](/Channeling "Channeling")
- [Guile](/Guile "Guile") - Reduces [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") of both the wielder and their targets
- [Light](/Light "Light") - Surrounds the wielder with a 3-tile [halo](/Halo "Halo")
- [Mayhem](/Mayhem "Mayhem") - May send enemies into a [frenzy](/Frenzy "Frenzy")
- [Wrath](/Wrath "Wrath") - Has a 20% of inducing [berserk](/Berserk "Berserk") rage when the wielder attacks

Orbs will always spawn with one of the egos listed above. [Randart](/Randart "Randart") orbs will always spawn with one of these egos.

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), orbs could not appear as [randarts](/Randart "Randart"). Also, three [unrand](/Unrand "Unrand") orbs were introduced in this version (all formely staff unrands).
- Equippable orbs were added in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").
